data.text: @CTVNews @PHughes1971 There should not be any restrictions for any Canadian to leave the country as long as the destination has no restrictions. @JustinTrudeau continues to violate our charter of rights!!! This is criminal & undemocratic!

@andrewdhunter @tiredCanadian7 @CTVNews Your opinions on public health are as bad as your music.  I hope when you or your family get sick you don’t go to a hospital from now on.  You know more then medical science.
@shawngarth0 @tiredCanadian7 @CTVNews No - you’re misinformed-  I should be allowed to leave- not enter. Idiot.
@andrewdhunter @tiredCanadian7 @CTVNews If this isn’t entitlement I don’t know what is.  “Other counties shld let me in no matter what”.
@tiredCanadian7 @CTVNews We shouldn’t even need a test we should just be able to leave
